products.title: Thermal Plus Linen Energy Saving Roller Blind
products.description: Keep your home looking lovely and feeling snug with the thermal plus linen roller blind. A light and neutral colourway with fantastic energy saving properties is a fabulous mix. With a pearlised backing that keeps the cold out and the heat in, you can slash your energy bills at keep your home looking lovely and feeling snug with the thermal plus linen roller blind.
